contents: Rain or shine, enjoy 50% off your next order*
We can't help with the forecast, but we can help with dinner.
Order in with 50% off your next order*
*30% off (save up to £12) when you spend £15 or more on menu items
(excluding fees and the value of promotional items) available until 27 Feb 2026 1:00AM.
Valid on 5 orders from selected restaurants made via the Uber Eats app in the UK
(check the Uber Eats app for availability of deliveries and restaurants).
Offer is not valid on any basket that includes alcohol or tobacco products.
Offer only applies to orders for delivery and excludes orders for pick-up and dine-in.
Delivery fee and service fee apply.
You order in a pizza. It's expensive.
